ValidationRule.description: When the Project Units are "Duration" the Duration field is required
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: /*Unless the Units value is "Duration" the Duration is required*/ ISPICKVAL(project_cloud__Units__c, "Duration") && (ISBLANK(project_cloud__Duration__c) || project_cloud__Duration__c < 0)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Units for this Project Task require a Duration value to be defined
